identifiedFood: Pepperoni pizza with a thin crust, tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and approximately 7 slices of pepperoni. The pizza appears to be approximately 12 inches in diameter.
additionalNotes: Contains gluten (from the crust) and dairy (from the cheese).
Not vegetarian due to the pepperoni.
May contain other allergens depending on the ingredients of the sauce and pepperoni.
